oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Capt. Walter Bowie, Co. G, 40th Va. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Capt. Walter Bowie, Co. G, 40th Va. Inf. Regt., CSA. The backmark is obscured but does indicate Charleston, SC. His hometown seems to be Port Royal, Va. He relocated to Nashville in 1879. Bowie was severely wounded at Gettysburg and unfit for field duty. He was subsequently assigned to the Inspector General's Department and served in South Carolina.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bowie, Walter, Captain
